metadata.dc:author: Suárez Richards, Manuel
metadata.dc:description: Neuroscientific knowledge have enter to psychiatry in a new era, however, new technology for viewing images, brain function, psychopharmacology, non-invasive methodology requires an ethical approach, framed in the bioethical environment. The field of neuroethics has evolved to address many of the specific concerns and what neuroenhancement and neuroimaging provide us, is necessary to extend the scope of ethical things to consider the clinical implications for the psychiatric work.
metadata.dc:title: Psiquiatría y neuroética.
[Psychiatry and neuroethics].
